name: Tao Meng
story: Tao Meng was born and raised in the province of Hunan, China. He spent much of his youth working on his father's farm and developed a strong work ethic. After completing his compulsory military service, Tao joined the PLA's armored division where he distinguished himself as a skilled and reliable crewman. His superiors noted his leadership potential and he was quickly promoted to the rank of Sergeant. Tao is fiercely loyal to his country and his comrades, and is always the first to volunteer when a difficult mission is at hand. He takes great pride in his role as a Crewman and maintains the armored vehicles with meticulous care.
